title: Use newly uploaded photo for Founder & Owner section

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded founder/owner image as a frontend static asset and update the FounderOwnerBlock to display it.
acceptanceCriteria: The file "B9880E96-BF00-4325-A5A7-C90172ACF09D-16.png" exists in the frontend public static assets directory and is accessible via a /assets/... URL at runtime.
frontend/src/components/site/FounderOwnerBlock.tsx uses the new /assets/... path for the so the uploaded photo is visible in the Founder & Owner block on both mobile and desktop breakpoints.
The image alt text remains accessible and in English, and continues to reference the Founder/Owner (e.g., "Photo of the Founder and Owner, Nizamuddin Khan").
No backend changes are introduced for serving or fetching the image.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image file as a publicly served static asset under a stable path so it is available at runtime via a /assets/... URL.

Update the founder/owner to use src="/assets/B9880E96-BF00-4325-A5A7-C90172ACF09D-16.png" while preserving existing responsive sizing/styling and keeping the alt text accessible and in English referencing the Founder/Owner.
